article:
Dear Mr. Smith,
I'm a middle school student in Shanghai. My parents are  _  with me, so they make lots of  _  for me at home.
I have to get up _  5:40 every morning. I have to  _  English for an hour before breakfast. I can't play with my friends after school,  _ I have to get home early. In the evening I can't go out. I have to do my homework and then _ the piano for two hours. I have no time to _ . On weekends, two tutors   come to my home. They  _  me with my math and English. I am really not  _  with all these rules. I never have fun at home.  _ can I do? Please help me.
Yours,
Zhang Yue
